transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji. Haan. Sir. Hello. Haan ji sir aawaz aa raha hai aapko? Ji bataye. Haan ji bataye bhaiya. Ji. Bhaiya sir aapne ek feedback diya tha sir call pe IndiaMART ke through. Ji sir. Sir usi liye call kiya tha maine aapko. Aap sir. Haan. Boliye sir. Aap aap kaun se? Sir main yahan IndiaMART se head office se business manager hun sir. Hello.
Customer: Business manager sir bol rahe hain?
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Achha to sir agar agar time agar subah agar main baat kar paun aapse. Woh thoda sa ek jagah invitation mein aaya tha. Aur. Thoda sa time bhi ho gaya mujhe aapko batane mein. Ab kabhi bhi sir 10:00 baje ke baad kabhi bhi call kar lijiye sir. Sir kis regarding baat karni thi? Main jaan sakta hun?
Executive: Sir do cheezon ke regarding baat karni thi. Ek sir do cheezon ke regarding baat karni thi sir. Pehla ye sir jo call abhi gaya tha na us pe aapne feedback diya tha Vikrant ke call ke upar. Aur second sir aapka ek saal pura ho gaya IndiaMART pe but aap service renew nahi karana chah rahe IndiaMART ke saath. To dono cheez main samjhana chah raha hun ki account manager ka kya dikkat aayi hai aur IndiaMART pe kya dikkat aayi hai. Ji sir.
Customer: Ji sir.
Customer: Dekhiye mujhe mujhe account manager se dikkat nahi hai sir. Kyunki account manager Vikrant ke naam se feedback aata hai isliye feedback majburi hai mujhe dena. Baaki ek madam ne mujhse baat ki thi. To mujhe thoda sa theek hai unhone call kar rahe the renewal ke liye. Main thoda hospitalize tha aur saari cheeze thi mere saath kuch possibility thi. To unka kehna tha ki hum log call karte hain aap log uthate nahi hain. Itne din se phone kar rahe hain nahi karana to mat karaiye. Sir koi baat nahi lekin aap aise hyper hoke hot shot karenge to phir mere liye bhi woh cheez bhi achha nahi hai na aapke liye. Kyunki main agar saal bhar se main baat kar raha hun agar aapke business ke regarding aur ek buylead success nahi ho pa rahi hai aapki. Agar mere mein koi kami hai to aapke account manager se baat kariye. Woh mere baare mein behtar jaante hain. Jo jo woh bolte hain woh main karta hun. Saari cheeze main batata hun har cheez hota hai. Lekin uske bawajood aap aise baat kar rahi hain jaise lag raha hai ki main aapke liye sirf person hun keval. To mujhe buylead aapse chahiye aur chahe ek bhi nahi agar success ho rahi hai to aap pata kariye kyun nahi buylead meri 365 din mein ek bhi success ho paayi. Meri call details check karenge. Mere communication check karenge ki bhai customer ke saath kaise hai. Mere local ke customer mere kaise hain. Main aath saal se business chala raha hun to mere customer ban rahe hain ki bigad rahe hain. Ye sab aap pata karenge na. Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur aapki taraf se mere IndiaMART se ek buylead agar success nahi ho rahi hai to uska kuch to reason hoga sir. Sir main profile aapki check kar raha tha sir jab mahine ki dekhiye response rate mein 40-50 call aa rahi hai aapko aap bhi mahine mein har din isko open kar rahe hain aur bahut achhe se services use kar rahe hain. Sir saat aath review bhi pada hua hai aapke profile pe saat aath review bhi pada hua hai profile pe. Ho sakta hai sir aapka deal mein upar client se achhi baat hui hogi to response unhone diya review wagera bhi aapko diya hai. Hai na? Ji sir.
Customer: Abhi latest ka bhi aapka 5 October ka hi hai ek Buxar Bihar se 5 October ko hi review mila hai. Haan haan. Ji. To matlab sir ye sab jo responses mil rahe hain to woh. Sir main ye jaanna chah raha hun jaise maan lijiye ki. Haan haan. Pardon me sir. Main ye jaanna chah raha hun jaise maan lijiye ki agar ek hafte mein mujhe 14 ya 12 milte hain theek hai? 12 milte hain mujhe theek hai. Ab main main agar ek hafte ka keval ek scenario leke chalta hun to agar ek buylead bhi agar main 12 hun to main touch karta hun. Unhone pehle kaha ki apne local mein touch kar lijiye sir. Beech beech mein cheeze badalti gayi ki aap pan India deal kar rahe hain. Machineon ke liye change sir ek hi machine ke liye kitne ho payenge customer. To main badhata gaya ki bhaiya mere paas 18 machineon ka sale hai aap sab pe buylead check kar lijiye meri. Phir unhone account manager mere kahe jaise kahe ki haan aap ye review aur saari cheeze bhi check kiya kariye. Main kaha woh bhi sahi hai. Har cheez hua. Lekin uske bawajood agar ek buylead mere paas relevant aati hai aap mujhe buylead ke baare mein puchte ki haan sir kaisa aa raha hai kya dikkate aa rahi hain. To account manager mere puchte hain main bilkul batata hun unko ki bhai main do baar teen baar unko recall karta hun chaar baar recall karta hun. Kuch kuch customer gaali bhi dene lagte hain. Kuch kuch customer aise bhi hote hain jo denied kar dete hain ya phir phone uthate are yaar kyun 5 baar phone karte ho. Is type se bhi hain. To customer jo aapki taraf se mil rahe hain mujhe woh to irrelevant nahi hue na phir. Aur uske baad itna main sehne ke baad ek saal apna barbaad karna 36000 40000 rupaye jo barbaad kiya uske baad ab aap mujhse agar is tarah baat kariye ki haan bhaiya aap log phone karne ko uthate nahi hain teen din se phone kar raha hun ye hai woh hai. To bhaiya tab to mere liye bhi hot spot karna majburi ho jayegi phir. Sir dekhiye main woh review kar leta hun. Jo BSN team BSN team jo aapki madam. Jo BSN madam thi unka kehna tha ki bataye aap humko kyun teen din se phone kar rahe hain. Main kaha main marne ke baad kya aapko phone karunga? Aap humse ye thodi puchiye ki aap kahan hai kahan nahi hai kya baat karne ke baad. Aapse do baar baat hui main aapse kaha ki theek hai renewal karne ki possibility hai. Lekin aap apne thoda usse dhyaan dijiye kyunki buylead mere paas success nahi aa rahi. To aap usse na dhyaan deke mujhe roz pressure kar rahi hain ki aaj aap activate nahi kara rahe hain activate nahi kara rahe hain. Main phone mein aapka lock kar dungi main kaha lock kar dijiye. Aap is tarah baat karne wali kaun hoti hain? Nahi nahi unhone kaha ki main dusre number se phone kiya aapne utha liya. Main kaha ji bataye dusre number se aapne phone kiya ya koi bhi apne number se phone kiye ho agar aapke customer phone kar rahe hain mere pe agar aapka success nahi hai to main aapka kyun zaroori kyun samjhe. Aur aaj ek mahine se mujhe renewal karne ke liye baat kar rahi hain. Mere account manager se baat kariye kyun woh naraz hai kyun aap apna renewal nahi plan karana chahte hain. Main abhi bhi unse bola ki main renewal plan kara dunga lekin aap mujhe kuch to guarantee dijiye ki saal bhar mein aap ek buylead success nahi ho rahi to dusre saal mein kitne success kar lenge. Mere customer se aap baat kariye agar main kharab baat karta hun to. Mere agar customer se aap baat kar lijiye ek baar kyunki bhai main to aap hi ke buylead hoga na aap hi ke customer honge na kyunki main apni taraf se baat karta hun to behtar aata hai mere mere mere local mein main aath saal se chala raha hun mujhe machine bikri mein koi dikkat kami nahi hai. Aur aapke madhyam se mujhe ek success nahi mil rahi hai main ye bhi nahi kehne ja raha hun ki aap GST ke through customer payment na kare koi dikkat nahi hai aap karaiye payment. Ye iska matlab ye thodi hota hai ki aap purchase kar liye aur uske baad chhod diye ki bhaiya aap apni taraf se dekh lijiye 365 mein nahi 64 mein din aapse baat karungi phir renewal karna hai. Ye koi tarika nahi hua sir. Main bhi company chala raha hun main bhi dekh raha hun us cheez ko. Ji sir bilkul sahi hai. Mujhe baat karne ka tarika mujhe pasand nahi aaya sir agar agar uske liye agar uske liye sir bura hai to main sorry bolta hun lekin mujhe unka baat karne ka tarika pasand nahi aaya. Haan tab uske baad main unko dobara call hua to main Vikrant ji se bataya ki Vikrant ji aap mujhe 365 din se jaante hain. Agar main aaj se pehle kabhi bhi ek buylead bhi success na hone ke bawajood agar main kabhi aapse badtameezi se baat kiya hun to mujhe bataye. Agar unke upar pressure hai ki nahi unhe renewal karna hai unka koi target pura karna hai main samajh sakta hun private naukri karte hain sir lekin uske liye mujhe woh pressure na kare. Kyunki main hospitalize hun main saari cheeze main unko message karke message karke Vikrant ji ko bataye Vikrant ji ko bataye mujhe kyun nahi bataye. Main kaha main theka leke nahi baitha hun aapka. Ki aap kaun hai kaun hai main nahi aapko jaanta. Mujhse jo saal bhar baat ki main usko jaanta hun main usko bataya hun aap unse confirm kar sakti hain aur jab aapko confirm ho chuka hai to aap usse realization mujhse baat nahi kar sakti. Main is karan se sir main renewal nahi karana chahta bas yahi ek main fact hai. Warna main unse prem se bola tha ki main thoda sa thodi hospital mein dikkat mein hun thoda sa mujhe samay dijiye. Ab ye kahiye ki nahi bhaiya bhaiya pehle renewal kara lijiye uske baad apni dawa karaiye to bhaiya kaun us plan ka istemal karega jab main nahi rahunga to. Ye to sir ek sarasar woh ho gaya na main complaint karne ko taiyar hun main bola main FIR karta hun bhai aap log manani ka dawa main karta hun ki aap mujhe pressurize kar rahi hain. Hmm hmm hmm hmm. Ye baat karne ka tarika thodi hai ki nahi aapko main teen din se phone kar rahi hun aap phone ek call center bana liye hain ye hai woh hai. Main kaha mazak mat banaiye madam. Aap mujhe saal bhar baat kariye main baat karunga mere mere paas 400 customer sabse thodi baat karungi. Main kaha mat baat kariye to aap mujhe jo mere account manager hain unse baat karne dijiye mera man karega main renewal karunga nahi man karega nahi karunga. Ye koi tarika thodi hua ki main aap aap mujhse aise deal karenge. Theek hai sir main Starting mein to mujhe sabne baat kiya IndiaMART ke salon ne do mahine do mahine se usko monitor kiya maine kaha yaar main kara lunga jab aap ek baar bol diye to main kara dunga samay aane dijiye to maine unko 15 din 16 din ka samay diya maine 18 din kara diya. Hmm hmm hmm. To main sabko apna apna woh face karta nahi chalunga na sir. Sir yahi mera main majburi mein majburi mein Vikrant ji ke naam se feedback aaya to mujhe resubmit karna pad gaya warna main unse pehle hi bola tha ki IndiaMART se mujhe sabse highest jo aapke jo dekhte hain main unse complaint karne ko taiyar hun main abhi bhi complaint karne ko taiyar hun. Ki mujhe sirf itne ka jawab de de ki 365 mein aap mujhe package chhat ke de rahe hain to ek bhi success ho gaya ho to mujhe bata dijiye aur meri taraf se agar koi kami ho mere call recording ho saari cheeze saari cheeze aap kariye. Meri call recording ho mere customer se interaction ho. Nahi hua na tabhi to main keh raha hun isliye to aapko sochna chahiye na sir ki main kaise sochun woh bataiye aap. Hmm hmm. Nahi sir main wohi aapke aapke company ka response dekh ke main baat kar raha hun ki agar samne se aapko agar 40-45 call aa rahi hai buyer samne se aapko call kar raha hai aur aur main meri call meri call duration bhi check kariye ki main cut haan meri call duration bhi check kariye main customer se kitni der tak baat karta hun. Aapke IndiaMART ki pehli ye demerit hai ki customer ki aawaz nahi aati hai ya phir meri aawaz customer tak nahi jaati hai kuch timeon mein kuch calls mein aise condition paaye gaye main us us samay mein apne aap se call back karta hun turant. Tab uska customer ka number aata hai to main call karta hun ki nahi bhai theek hai main call kar lun ek baar customer kya pata interested ho aur mere na contact karne se chhut jaaye. Woh wahan bhi effort karta hun saari cheeze. Ji sir mujhe ye ab ye ab ye silsila agar ek saal chala hai aapka baat cheet. Haan haan haan. Haan ji. Ek saal ke baad bhi main ye unse jaanna chah raha tha ki ek saal baad mujhe aap bata dijiye ki ek buylead kyun nahi success hui aapki. Mujhe complaint karna chahiye aapke upar. Sir aap bilkul complaint kariye lekin main aapse sunna chah raha hun ki jab aapne itne achhe se baat ki hai sabko sab kuch team ke team kya samjhaya to aapki baat kahan aisi success rahi hai kis cheez se rahi hai to kuch to reason hoga jo aapko. Kuch log bolte hain kuch log to kuch log visit bhi karne aaye kuch log visit bhi karne aaye kuch customer aise the jo sabse product chahte the to maine kaha ki bhai sabse product bhi mil jayenge to kuch product mujhe direct bhi deal karne ki koshish kiye to main kaha ji nahi sir aap IndiaMART ke through payment kariye. Bataye main itni loyalty dikhaya IndiaMART ke through. Sir IndiaMART ke through payment ka to abhi woh nahi hai na matlab gateway bhi nahi hai woh to. Nahi main samajh gaya tha lekin aapko samjhata tha. Aap samjhata tha. Hmm. Lekin main is dhang se is roop mein aapse baat nahi karta bhaiya. Mujhe bas wohi bura laga ki madam ka inka kehna main call center bana liye hain aap log call nahi uthate ho. Main kaha madam suniye call center aap bhi bana chuki hain phir. Mere paas farzi farzi buylead bhej ke aap call center bana chuki hain. Aapko nahi baat karni hai mat baat kariye mujhse mere account manager agar achhe the to main unse relation mere achhe honge. Hmm. Achhe honge to wohi bata denge na ki humne saal bhar mein badtameezi se baat karte hain kya jaise bhi. Hmm hmm. Abhi khud raat ko IndiaMART se bhi call aa raha hai. Ab ye customer call aa raha hai theek hai. Haan ji. Ji. Ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting successful buyleads.

- Customer received inappropriate behavior from executive.

- Customer is being pressured for renewal.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Executive assured to check the customer's profile.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. None.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, renewal, customer service, complaint
